Source: vignettes/import_data.Rmd
import_data.Rmd

Import Data

Content of the demo data set “ellboegen_100.csv”

## timestamp;dd;ff;rh;t
## 1136077200;171; 0.6; 90; -0.4
## 1136080800;268; 0.3;100; -1.8
## 1136084400;115; 5.2; 79;  0.9
## 1136088000;152; 2.1; 88; -0.6
## 1136091600;319; 0.7;100; -2.6
## 1136095200; 36; 0.1; 99; -1.7
## 1136098800;338; 1.0;100; -2.1
## 1136102400;324; 1.1;100; -2.7
## 1136106000;303; 0.2;100; -2.6
# Change directory (where 'ellboegen_100.csv' is stored)
setwd("../pkgdown/data")

# Loading library "zoo"
library("zoo")

# Import data set
# Define the function which converts the index column (first column)
# from UNIX time stamp (seconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00) to POSIXct
FUN <- function(x, origin, tz) as.POSIXct(x, tz = tz, origin = "1970-01-01 00:00:00")

# Read data set
data <- read.zoo("ellboegen_100.csv", sep = ";", header = TRUE,
                 FUN = FUN, tz = "UTC",
                 na.strings = "NA", strip.white = TRUE)
# Class/head of the object
head(data)
##                      dd  ff  rh    t
## 2006-01-01 01:00:00 171 0.6  90 -0.4
## 2006-01-01 02:00:00 268 0.3 100 -1.8
## 2006-01-01 03:00:00 115 5.2  79  0.9
## 2006-01-01 04:00:00 152 2.1  88 -0.6
## 2006-01-01 05:00:00 319 0.7 100 -2.6
## 2006-01-01 06:00:00  36 0.1  99 -1.7
